description:
From our law office in Boynton Beach, Florida, our attorneys at Frankl Kominsky Injury Lawyers provide unmatched advocacy and support to clients throughout Palm Beach County and the rest of South Florida who have suffered injuries or lost loved ones due to others' negligence or wrongdoing.

With additional law offices in Pompano Beach and Port St. Lucie, we have grown to become one of South Florida's leading personal injury legal practices, and we promise to do all we can to help increase your chances of obtaining the maximum amount of compensation you need and the justice you deserve.

Over the course of our history, our lawyers have recovered millions of dollars in total compensation for our plaintiff clients, earning memberships in the Million Dollar Advocates Forum and Multi-Million Dollar Advocates Forum. In addition, our attorneys have earned inclusions in The National Trial Lawyers: Top 40 Under 40 list along with many other top rankings and endorsements from our peers. Moreover, we have also received "Superb" ratings on Avvo as well as numerous testimonials and referrals from those we have served.

No matter what the cause of your suffering is, you can find a dedicated legal advocate at Frankl Kominsky Injury Lawyers who is ready to fight hard to protect your rights and entitlements and improve the likelihood of a successful outcome. To begin the process, you can contact our law office to schedule a free initial consultation. We are currently offering virtual consultations to help keep you and your family safe and healthy in these uncertain times.
